markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 29 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 [Boggard Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2237) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 95 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +18, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +15, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17 **Str** +4 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +3 **Items** [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66) (6 darts coated with [giant wasp venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=115)), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +17 **Will** +18 **HP** 135 --- **Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride **Melee** _whip_ +18 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 2d6+8 slashing **Melee** tongue +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** tongue grab **Ranged** blowgun +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1 piercing plus [giant wasp venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=115) **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **1st** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **4th** [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) **Gogunta's Croak** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The boggard cultist unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet must attempt a DC 25 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is temporarily immune to
Gogunta's Croak for 1 minute. **Success** The creature is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19)
**Failure** The creature is frightened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 3 and is also [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) during their next turn. **Swamp Stride** A boggard cultist ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features. **Tongue Grab** If the boggard cultist hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the boggard. Unlike with a normal Grab, the creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 25 and dealing at least 10 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.
name: Boggard Cultist

text: Boggard Cultist Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 29 Unspecific Lore : DC 27 Specific Lore : DC 24 Boggard Cultist Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 95 Perception +16; darkvision Languages Abyssal, Boggard, Common Skills Athletics +16, Intimidation +17, Medicine +18, Nature +15, Performance +15, Religion +17, Stealth +17 Str +4 Dex +5 Con +4 Int +3 Wis +6 Cha +3 Items blowgun (6 darts coated with giant wasp venom), Hide Armor, +1 striking whip --- AC 27 Fort +14 Ref +17 Will +18 HP 135 --- Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride Melee Single Action whip +18 (Disarm, Finesse, Nonlethal, Reach, Trip), Damage 2d6+8 slashing Melee Single Action tongue +16 (reach 10 feet), Damage tongue grab Ranged Single Action blowgun +17 (Agile, Nonlethal), Damage 1 piercing plus giant wasp venom Divine Prepared Spells DC 26, attack +18 - Cantrips (4th) Daze, Divine Lance, Know Direction, Shield, Stabilize - 1st Command, Heal, Ray of Enfeeblement - 2nd Darkness, Heal, See Invisibility - 3rd Blindness, Fear, Vampiric Touch - 4th Divine Wrath, Heal, Sound Burst Gogunta's Croak Single Action (Auditory, Divine, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental) The boggard cultist unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet must attempt a DC 25 Will save. Critical Success The creature is temporarily immune to Gogunta's Croak for 1 minute. Success The creature is frightened 1 Failure The creature is frightened 2. Critical Failure The creature is frightened 3 and is also fleeing during their next turn. Swamp Stride A boggard cultist ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features. Tongue Grab If the boggard cultist hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes grabbed by the boggard. Unlike with a normal Grab, the creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 25 and dealing at least 10 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.
